skillTree.localised_description: A horse! A horse! An acceptable amount of florins for a horse!

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

skillTree.localised_description: A rare arabyan Pegasus, gifted by Crusaders. A living and swift siphon of light and magic, ready to unleash their energy on aggressors.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: You take care of your mates, and they take care of you.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: The Goddess of Battle protects Her own.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

skillTree.localised_description: Being considered a true friend by the Dwarfs is a huge honour and benefit. As long as one keeps being careful not to offend them.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for all dwarfen units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Good warriors and equipment coming from the mountains, not only the poorest dwarf misfits and adventurers caught at a low ebb.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for all Dwarfen units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for all Dwarfen units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +5 for all heavy armour units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Sincere Dwarf warriors will defend your kin like their own. And teach your own fighters to fight like they do.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +2 for all units
	(all armies factionwide)

Recruit rank: +1 for infantry units
	(local province)

Melee attack: +5 for all units against Dwarfs
	(all armies factionwide)

skillTree.localised_description: Gods know the Dwarfs are careful with their trade relationships. Especially with related payments. Favoured ties are to be cherished.

"You shoulda seen him! There was the troll behind him, right, raising its club, then Beardy turns around and buries his axe right in the thing's face! And down it goes! Who would have known dem damn stunties can move that quickly? Oh, hey Beardy!"

effects.description:
Attrition: -33% casualties suffered from wasteland attrition
	(all armies)

Attrition: -33% casualties suffered from mountain attrition
	(all armies)

Upkeep: -15% for missile infantry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Well-used to fierce struggles against countless invaders, this Lord has earned the trust of the Rangers.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: Master of one of those small domains that make the Border Princes, this Lord can rely on his citizens and local supporters.

skillTree.localised_description: Don't ask them about living on the edge. Or huge green things with teeth.

skillTree.localised_description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Well, this is straightforward enough.

skillTree.localised_description: Oh wait, there's another chapter.

skillTree.localised_description: The key is not letting your initiative depend on a lucky die.
It's seldom enough to have only some of your troops to be ready to take a beating. The enemy has their own plans.

skillTree.localised_description: "You kill them before they kill you, sonnie. That's all it is."

effects.description:
Melee attack: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Though of course, if they do stab you, you better know how to parry."

effects.description:
Melee defence: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Plus, you better kill them dead with the one shot you have."

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "And to do that, it helps if you put all your weight where it counts."

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +2% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "Look, at the end of the day, you may be alive and you better learn from what didn't kill you."

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +1% per experience rank for all units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
Sometimes it is just time to party. The louder, the better.
Revered by the masses, such a celebrated leader will inspire many new recruits.
The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.
It is said that Sigmar would bear a mortal wound and carry on fighting; this champion follows the hallowed Warrior-God.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.localised_description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.
Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.
Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

skillTree.localised_description: "Ever thought about joining the Elector's troops, chief? You'd make a good soldier alright."

factionEffects.localised_description: The Prince of Akendorf is a strong guide with many challenges around and ahead of him.

items.colour_text: A Dwarf's grudge is forever, but so is his gratitude for many lives saved. The unexpected gift of a family runic axe is to be remembered for just as long.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for all dwarfen units
	(all armies)

items.colour_text: Formerly a magic and fluttering arabyan turban, this souvenir bears energetic enchantments. The cadre of Myrmidian priests who prodded it for a week have testified that the scarf won't strangle Gausser of its own initiative anytime soon, which is oddly specific.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
